title: Pope Francis Makes A Visit To Israel
teaser: NPR’s Emily Harris discusses expected highlights of the pope’s trip, and what both Israelis and Palestinians expect out of the papal visit.
contentencoded:
On Monday, Pope Francis will travel to Israel, as part of his three-day tour of the Holy Land.

NPR’s international correspondent Emily Harris will be covering his trip from Jerusalem. She joins Here & Now’s Robin Young to discuss expected highlights of the pope’s trip, and what both Israelis and Palestinians expect out of the papal visit.

Guest

  • Emily Harris, NPR international correspondent in Jerusalem. She tweets @emilygharris.
Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
